name: mistral-ai-internal
title: Mistral AI Internal
description: A collection of internal tools for Mistral AI
author: benjaminwaterlot

commands.name: deploy
commands.title: Deploy a TS app
commands.description: Deploy a TS app to a given environment

commands.name: super-pr
commands.title: Super PR
commands.description: Publish a release PR to Slack with GitHub details and smart changelog

preferences.name: dashboardRepoPath
preferences.title: Dashboard Repo Path
preferences.description: Path to the dashboard repo on your local machine

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
